mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fa_oper_log (title, business, `action`, status, `method`, uri, ip, error_msg, params, response, location, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{business}, #{action}, #{status}, #{method}, #{uri}, #{ip}, #{errorMsg}, #{params}, #{response}, #{location}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, now(), now())
